title: (x) Kings Of Leon "Only By The Night" typography -Überform {John Brown}
content: hi anyone know either of the fonts shown? or any similar style fonts? thanks in advance[img:anteropo\_6385.jpg][img:kol\_logo\_3485.jpg]
author: simundo

comments.content:
ANTREPO could be Lineto's Autoscape (maybe thickend with an outline and a modified N)  
... KINGS OF LEON is eventually also a modification of Autoscape, but not sure...

I agree ANTREPO is very reminiscent of Autoscape. I don't think "Kings of Leon" is based on it, though – there are too many differences (I, N are obvious; terminals of K, curve of S, "roundness" of G …)

thanks for your kind help! okay here is another reference [img:22\_3907.jpg]

this is a standard font i assume as its featured throught this guys site [http://www.jasonmayo.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120314233112/http:/www.jasonmayo.co.uk/ "http://www.jasonmayo.co.uk/")

this one would do the trick for what i need it for if anyone knows what it is? thanks again.

I know this is old, but I found the exact font they've used in this. It's bionic system's Uberform - regular. you can see it if you buy their digital booklet and open in illustrator.  
i hope it's OK to bring this old thread up :D

Hi John,

this came up a couple of times before, see especially [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20120314233112/http:/typophile.com/node/66953).

If [this image](http://web.archive.org/web/20120314233112/http:/typophile.com/files/Uberform.gif) (from [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20120314233112/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16552) really shows Überform (which I do not doubt), then there is more than one version out there: the [Überform on Bionic Systems’ website](http://web.archive.org/web/20120314233112/http:/archiv.digitalcraft.org/bionic/fonts.html) is different; maybe it’s just an early preview.

Do you have a link where this digital booklet can be purchased?

Thanks for the info!

digital booklet can be purchased at itunes, and when you open it in AI it says that überform - regular is missing (along some other fonts, but they are completely different).

and about the two versions: i think that on that website is an older version (because the page starts with an [www.archiv](http://web.archive.org/web/20120314233112/http:/www.archiv/ "www.archiv"). and i suppose that it hasn't been updated for a long time), and that in picture is newer version. also, if you go to the original BS [[http://www.bionic-systems.com/]website] you can (barely) see in the headlines that the G, I and N are like in that picture preview someone posted.

i wonder does the Bionic Systems sell their fonts?

and if you want, i can send you a booklet, just send me a message :)
